text: Demanding action against a priest for attempting to sexually harass a maid, over 20 people staged a protest outside a church in Kuppampalayam on Tiruchy Road here on Sunday. The 31-year-old woman of Erumapatty, in her complaint to the Superintendent of Police, said that she was working at the priest’s house. In May 2015, the priest had attempted to sexually harass her. In February 2016, she lodged a complaint against the priest at the All Women Police Station in Namakkal. But no action was taken, she said.
title: Protest held
